title: Subscribe Button Functionality
description: Verify that the Subscribe button is clickable and leads to the correct subscription page or action.
steps: 1. Locate the Subscribe button on the top right corner of the page. 2. Click the Subscribe button.
expected_result: The user is redirected to a subscription page or a subscription action is initiated.

title: Discord Button Link
description: Ensure the Discord button redirects to the correct Discord community page.
steps: 1. Locate the Discord button next to the Subscribe button. 2. Click the Discord button.
expected_result: The user is redirected to the AI Frontiers Discord community page.

title: Archive Button Functionality
description: Check if the Archive button redirects to the archived news or articles section.
steps: 1. Locate the Archive button next to the Discord button. 2. Click the Archive button.
expected_result: The user is redirected to a page displaying archived articles or news.

title: Dark/Light Mode Toggle
description: Verify that clicking the Light button toggles between dark and light modes.
steps: 1. Locate the Light button on the top right corner. 2. Click the Light button.
expected_result: The webpage theme toggles between dark and light modes.

title: Search Functionality
description: Ensure the search bar allows users to search for articles.
steps: 1. Locate the search bar under the Latest AI News heading. 2. Enter a keyword (e.g., 'AI'). 3. Press Enter or click the search icon.
expected_result: The page displays search results related to the entered keyword.

title: Article Link Navigation
description: Verify that clicking on the 'Original Article' link opens the original article in a new tab or window.
steps: 1. Locate the 'Original Article' link under the article title. 2. Click the link.
expected_result: The original article opens in a new tab or window.

title: Audio Playback Functionality
description: Check if the Audio button plays the article's audio version.
steps: 1. Locate the Audio button next to the article's score. 2. Click the Audio button.
expected_result: The audio version of the article starts playing.

title: NotebookLM Link Functionality
description: Ensure that the NotebookLM button opens the related notebook or document.
steps: 1. Locate the NotebookLM button next to the Audio button. 2. Click the NotebookLM button.
expected_result: The related notebook or document opens for viewing.

title: Date and Time Format
description: Verify the format of the date and time displayed under the Latest AI News heading.
steps: 1. Observe the date and time format under the Latest AI News heading.
expected_result: The date and time are displayed in a consistent and readable format (e.g., '1/2/2025, 7:06:05 AM').

title: Content Accuracy
description: Ensure the content under Article Summary and Discussion Highlights is accurate and free of typographical errors.
steps: 1. Read the content under Article Summary and Discussion Highlights. 2. Check for accuracy and typographical errors.
expected_result: The content is accurate and free from typographical errors.
